text: Oleandra hainanensis is a species of fern in the family Oleandraceae. It is endemic to China. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Polypodiales Category:Flora of China Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Plants described in 1959
title: Oleandra hainanensis
